Text: A pity only english subtitles are inclusive in this torrent, so the info isn't right, very good movie tho!
Thats why I didn't selected all the langs up in there.^^

Upthere in the texted langs I only selected English...

In the description I copied from the NFO.

Yeah right even in the NFO there where all these languages selected. As i understand u have chosen only the english text, that's ok. But next time write it down that u only have chosen 1 language, in your info above u misguides all downloaders. I have found a dutch sub which belongs to this movie at www.subtitlesnl.com. This one is not perfect, it has typo's and a few lines missing. For the rest a brilliant torrent, ty for that :) 

Btw there is a brilliant tool to merge all translations into this movie, i did it with mkvmerge, works fantastic.
thanks, a movie for my personal collections, and very stylish movie, better if you can add both DTS & AC3 audio's in your future release
